sentence.Network_en: Frolicsome students celebrated their graduation with parties and practical jokes.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱玩闹的学生们举行聚会,制造各种恶作剧来庆祝毕业.

sentence.Network_en: To amuse ( oneself ) a light, frolicsome manner.
sentence.Network_cn: 欢娱,使欢乐:以轻松 、 快乐的方式使 ( 自己 ) 娱乐.
